Landed halfway up into LF seats $After the first pitch, Kurowski asked Ump Conlan to look at the ball for possible perspiration.  Rowe then threw the next pitch high and tight, sending Kurowski spinning to the dirt, missing his head by inches.  He got up fighting mad, shouted at Rowe, and started for the mound.  Rowe answered back and left the rubber but Conlan stepped between them. Kurowski homered on the next pitch.
